channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens major immigration overhauls after National Guard shooting
item.description: President Trump said late Thursday that he "will permanently pause migration" from developing nations to the U.S. following the shooting in Washington...

item.title: Ukrainian anti-corruption raid targets Zelenskyy's prominent chief of staff
item.description: Ukrainian anti-corruption units have raided the home of President Volodymyr Zelenskyy’s chief of staff, Andrii Yermak

item.title: Tracking a major weekend winter storm threatening post-Thanksgiving travel

item.title: DC National Guard shooting suspect to be charged with first-degree murder, Pirro says
item.description: Jeanine Pirro announced the suspect's charges would be upgraded to first-degree murder following the death of one of the guardsmen.

item.title: Trump vows to ‘permanently pause’ migration from poor nations in anti-immigrant social media screed
Suspect faces murder charge in D.C. National Guard shooting
item.description: A National Guard member died in the wake of the shooting near the White House, President Trump said.
